Ghaus Ali Shah

Women used to came ‘Bauli’ to take the water for their daily needs. They have to come down the stone stairs. Archaeological Survey of India has taken up restoration work here. The Sheesh Mahal gives a glimpse of splendour and lavishness that the Mughal rulers enjoyed in the past. This monument is also known as Baoli Ghaus Ali Shah. The Building is octagonal in shape and has been built inside Sheesh Mahal Complex.
Baoli Ali Ghaus Shah – Farrukh Nagar Gurgaon Haryana
Farrukh Nagar Fort
This is a nice place to visit for those taking keen interest in history or the more adventurous tourists. The Fort is referred to as ‘Dilli Darwaza’ also.
Rohtak border in Farrukhnagar (Gurgaon)
Pataudi Palace

This Palace has been converted into a hotel. Pataudi Palace is also known as Ibrahim Kothi and belongs to the Pataudi family. Many Bollywood films have been shot in this Palace. The Nawab of Pataudi, Iftikhar Ali Khan got it designed by Robert Tor Russel and the Palace was built by Austrian Architect Karl Most Von Heinz.
Pataudi Village, Gurgaon
Aliwardi Masjid
This masjid is just 2 kms. from North of Old Tehsil Office of Gurgaon and is a 200 years old Legacy of Nawab Aliwardi Khan, Founder of Aliwardi Village.
Gurgaon
Thai Pavilion – Vivanta By Taj
Vivanta by Taj, Sector 44, Gurgaon
If you love Thai cuisine, you know this is your best bet. The food is delectable, all right, but is the service that surpasses all. The staff is attentive and knows what’s bet to offer from the menu.
Whisky Samba, Horizon Center
Two Horizon Center, DLF Phase 5, Golf Course Road, Gurgaon
At Whisky Samba, 18 is the new 12 when it comes to whisky selection and it brings the fun back in whisky drinking and mixology with a modern twist to progressive cooking styles and world dance music.
Amaranta – The Oberoi
The Oberoi, 443, Phase 5, Udyog Vihar, Gurgaon

The best seafood that you can relish in town is available here. A wide variety of coastal delicacies are available on the menu including crabs, fish and prawns. Indian authentic coastal cuisine is on offer that completely transports one to the south of the peninsula.
Spectra – The Leela Ambience
The Leela Ambience, Ambience Island, Ambience Mall, Gurgaon
Again a multi cuisine fine dining fare, the restaurant offers seven live kitchens dedicated to seven different cuisines. One is definitely spoilt for choice whilst here.
The Mad Teapot, Golf Course Road
Lower Ground Floor, DLF South Point Mall, Golf Course Road, Gurgaon
This magical cafe will woo you with its first look. Situated inside a beautiful shop, it truly couldn’t get better!
Di Ghent Cafe
208, Level 2, Cross Point Mall, DLF Phase 4, Gurgaon
A Belgian cafe amidst the city; think wooden tables, laid-back seating, European vibes and delicious food.
Another Fine Day
Ground Floor, MPD Towers, DLF Golf Course Road, Golf Course Road
Quaint and rustic, Another Fine Day is a reading room cafe bejewelled with fun and quirky accessories.
Cafe Amaretto
Ground Floor, DLF South Point Mall, Golf Course Road, Gurgaon
A significantly recent addition to Gurgaon’s cafe scene, Cafe Amaretto has gained quite a following for its simplistic ambience, relaxing vibe and Italian food.
The Trident
443, Gurgaon Road, Phase V, Udyog Vihar, Gurgaon
The award winning Trident, Gurgaon, is set amongst 7 acres of landscaped gardens, walkways, courtyards, reflection pools and fountains.
The Oberoi
Plot No.443, Off Swarna Jayanti Marg, Udyog Vihar, Phase V, Gurgaon
The hotel is located in the prime business and shopping district of Gurgaon in the Delhi-NCR and 15 minute drive from Delhi International Airport.
Courtyard By Marriott Gurugram Downtown
North Gurgaon (DLF Phase 1-5 | South City-1 | Sushant Lok-1 | Sector-29)
Courtyard by Marriott Gurugram Downtown is a boon fortoday’s ambitious travelers who are always looking to succeedin this modern world.
Le Meridien
North Gurgaon (DLF Phase 1-5 | South City-1 | Sushant Lok-1 | Sector-29)
Le Meridien is ideally located in the business hub of Gurgaon with Global Business Park, DLF Cyber City and Golf Course Road in close proximity and also offers easy access to Jaipur and Agra.
